deploy.name: deploy
deploy.description: Create a new deploy from the contents of a folder

options.name: --alias
options.description: Specifies the alias for deployment, the string at the beginning of the deploy subdomain. Useful for creating predictable deployment URLs. Avoid setting an alias string to the same value as a deployed branch. `alias` doesn’t create a branch deploy and can’t be used in conjunction with the branch subdomain feature. Maximum 37 characters.

options.name: --auth
options.description: Netlify auth token to deploy with

options.name: --branch
options.description: Serves the same functionality as --alias. Deprecated and will be removed in future versions

options.name: --build
options.description: Run build command before deploying

options.name: --context
options.description: Context to use when resolving build configuration

options.name: --dir
options.description: Specify a folder to deploy

options.description: For monorepos, specify the name of the application to run the command in

options.name: --functions
options.description: Specify a functions folder to deploy

options.name: --json
options.description: Output deployment data as JSON

options.name: --message
options.description: A short message to include in the deploy log

options.name: --open
options.description: Open site after deploy

options.name: --prod
options.description: Deploy to production

options.name: --prod-if-unlocked
options.description: Deploy to production if unlocked, create a draft otherwise

options.name: --site
options.description: A site name or ID to deploy to

options.name: --skip-functions-cache
options.description: Ignore any functions created as part of a previous `build` or `deploy` commands, forcing them to be bundled again as part of the deployment

options.name: --timeout
options.description: Timeout to wait for deployment to finish

options.name: --trigger
options.description: Trigger a new build of your site on Netlify without uploading local files
